attributes.action: Send a clear message to tories KEEP THE BAN ON FOX HUNTING
attributes.additional_details: Fox hunting is a savage and cruel pursuit and is not necessary to control foxes. Humane alternatives are available that are quick and clean. I don't mind hunting if you eat your kill but to allow an animal to be torn apart whilst alive by a pack of dogs is primitive and inhumane. It is a relic of the 19th century and has no place in educated civilised society.
